objects.specification: A flat rectangular floor panel spanning the exhibition area, finished in a neutral light gray tone to provide a subtle base. The surface is smooth matte concrete with slight texture, ensuring slip resistance and visual neutrality. It is designed to appear sturdy and seamless, creating a spacious foundation for all booth elements.

A smooth matte plaster wall in a neutral light gray tone, running the full width of the booth. The surface is uniform and uncluttered, with sharp edges and a clean finish to enclose the space and provide a backdrop for displays or branding.

A smooth matte plaster wall in a neutral light gray tone, running the full width of the booth. The surface is uniform and uncluttered, with sharp edges and a clean finish to enclose the space and provide a backdrop for displays or branding.

A smooth matte plaster wall in a neutral light gray tone, running the full depth of the booth. The surface is uniform and uncluttered, with sharp edges and a clean finish to enclose the space and provide a backdrop for displays or branding.

A smooth matte plaster wall in a neutral light gray tone, running the full depth of the booth. The surface is uniform and uncluttered, with sharp edges and a clean finish to enclose the space and provide a backdrop for displays or branding.

A sleek modern demonstration car with a glossy bright red finish. It features aerodynamic curves, sculpted panels, and contemporary alloy wheels. The windows are tinted, and the bodywork reflects light dynamically to draw attention. It sits low to the ground with a sporty profile and refined detailing.

A large rectangular reception desk with a corporate blue lacquer finish, featuring clean straight lines and a solid front panel. The countertop is smooth and spacious, designed for visitor interactions and brochure display, supported by a sturdy recessed base.

A tall rectangular display stand in corporate blue finish, with a sleek modern design. It has a flat top surface angled slightly to hold brochures or accessories, with minimalistic side panels and a solid base for stability.

A tall rectangular display stand in corporate blue finish, with a sleek modern design. It has a flat top surface angled slightly to hold brochures or accessories, with minimalistic side panels and a solid base for stability.

A tall rectangular display stand in corporate blue finish, with a sleek modern design. It has a flat top surface angled slightly to hold brochures or accessories, with minimalistic side panels and a solid base for stability.

A large rectangular hanging banner made of lightweight fabric, featuring a contrasting bright yellow background with a bold brand logo prominently centered. It has reinforced hems and slim mounting rods for a taut, wrinkle-free presentation.

A small cylindrical metal spotlight with a white powder-coat finish, mounted flush to the ceiling. It features an adjustable head aimed directly downward to highlight the car display with focused illumination.

A small cylindrical metal spotlight with a white powder-coat finish, mounted flush to the ceiling. It features an adjustable head aimed directly downward to highlight the car display with focused illumination.

A decorative potted plant with a cluster of lush green leaves in a simple neutral-colored ceramic pot. The foliage is full and organic, adding a natural accent to the booth corner.

A circular wooden table with a smooth lacquered surface and central pedestal base in a warm wood tone. It offers a cozy gathering spot for visitors and blends with the seating area design.

children.specification: A modern visitor chair with a wooden frame and cushioned seat upholstered in neutral fabric. It has a slightly curved backrest and slim legs for an ergonomic design.
